name: A Stroll in the Bleak Forest
description:
A Stroll In The Bleak Forest is a single player, 3D maze solving game. This is the second outing for our hero Bart Bear.

In the first game Bart thought he'd destroyed 'Mega-Brain' but the villain had one trick up its sleeve - it mind-warped to the planet Verdunian 7. Bart flies there to do battle because the beast has only one goal, the destruction of mankind!

The game is authored with 3D Game Maker. All screens are drawn in green and each screen shows a single cell. The player moves from one cell to another via gates in the walls, some cells have multiple entrances/exits while others have only one. Most cells have bad things in them.

Bart will encounter drones - invulnerable flying saucer things that just move back and forth, attack drones - these will shoot Bart but can be destroyed by Bart, spiders - Bart is immune to their poison but they cluster around him pinning him in one corner, and more.
